select.execute: var loweringselect = "env 'store://datatables.org/alltableswithkeys'; select * from vimeo.video where video_id=@video_id"; var loweringparams ={}; loweringparams ['video_id']= video_id; var loweringquery = y.query (loweringselect,loweringparams); response.object = loweringquery.results;

function.name: lifting
function.execute: function getValue(dataPath) { try{return eval(dataPath) || null; }catch(err){return null;}}try{ var oneJSON= y.xmlToJson(oneXML); var oneJSONLD={}; oneJSONLD['@id']=URI; oneJSONLD['@context']= {"schema":"http://schema.org/"}; oneJSONLD['@type']= 'schema:VideoObject'; oneJSONLD['schema:name'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['title']"); oneJSONLD['schema:description'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['description']"); oneJSONLD['schema:contentUrl'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['url']"); oneJSONLD['schema:uploadDate'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['upload_date']"); oneJSONLD['schema:embedUrl'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['mobile_url']"); oneJSONLD['schema:thumbnailUrl'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['thumbnail_medium']"); oneJSONLD['schema:thumbnailUrl'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['thumbnail_large']"); oneJSONLD['schema:duration'] = getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['duration']"); oneJSONLD['schema:interactionStatistic'] =[]; var interaction={}; interaction['@type']= 'schema:InteractionCounter'; interaction['schema:interactionType']='http://schema.org/LikeAction'; interaction['schema:userInteractionCount']=getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['stats_number_of_likes']"); oneJSONLD['schema:interactionStatistic'].push(interaction); var interaction={}; interaction['@type']= 'schema:InteractionCounter'; interaction['schema:interactionType']='http://schema.org/WatchAction'; interaction['schema:userInteractionCount']=getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['stats_number_of_plays']"); oneJSONLD['schema:interactionStatistic'].push(interaction); var interaction={}; interaction['@type']= 'schema:InteractionCounter'; interaction['schema:interactionType']='http://schema.org/CommentAction'; interaction['schema:userInteractionCount']=getValue("oneJSON['videos']['video']['stats_number_of_comments']"); oneJSONLD['schema:interactionStatistic'].push(interaction); }catch (err){ y.log(err);} response.object = oneJSONLD;
